name: VegasBot
description: What is the project about? VegasBot is a telegram bot which allows users to bet sports or play casino peer to peer or using a backend liquidity provider. No KYC, anytime, anywhere all from telegram. Enabling and promoting freedom. Everything you want with revenue share & rewards. What makes your project unique? VegasBot is the first telegram bot to offer in-house betting as well as peer-to-peer customized betting. You can bet from our sportsbook or create an entirely custom spread and match with other bettors. Our API allows us to fetch any sporting event. NCAAF, NFL, Golf or even celebrity boxing matches. History of your project. Our project was founded out of an underlying belief of freedom. We believe people should be able to transact peer to peer at lowest possible fees anywhere and at anytime Whatâ€™s next for your project? We will create a front-end UI sportsbook/casino to make it easier to interact with and add more social games such as poker, cards, roulette and other fun pvp games What can your token be used for? $VEGAS token holders are rewarded with discounted fees on sportsbetting & receive revenue sharing proportional to holdings from 1% $VEGAS volume traded/40% of transaction fees. Also eligible for secret prizes for community in the future.
